title: On the Kelly monoidal structure of $Λ$-sequences and unital operads
summary: Let $Λ$ be the category of based finite sets $\mathbf{n}$ and based injections. We study properties of monoids and modules in $Λ$-sequences under the Kelly monoidal structure. In particular, we show that the forgetful functor from right modules in $Λ$-sequences to right modules in symmetric sequences is an isomorphism. We show that any compatible lower data extends to a normal oplax monoidal structure and use this to establish a universal normal oplax monoidal structure on $Λ$-sequences extending the Kelly product, identifying unital operads to monoids in unital $Λ$-sequences for a general symmetric monoidal category $\mathscr{V}$. We also establish a closed monoidal localization theorem.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Λ-序列中幺半群和模的性质，证明了遗忘函子在Λ-序列和对称序列的右模之间是同构，建立了通用正规松驰幺半结构，并将幺半运算与幺半运算联系起来。
AI.motivation: 研究基于有限集和基于单射的范畴Λ中，在Kelly幺半结构下的幺半群和模的性质，旨在建立Λ-序列与对称序列之间的关系，并发展相关的幺半结构理论。
AI.method: 使用范畴论方法，分析Λ-序列中的幺半结构和模理论。证明遗忘函子的同构性质，构造正规松驰幺半结构，建立幺半运算与幺半运算的对应关系，并发展闭幺半局部化定理。
AI.result: 1. 证明了从Λ-序列的右模到对称序列的右模的遗忘函子是同构；2. 任何兼容的下数据都可以扩展为正规松驰幺半结构；3. 建立了Λ-序列上扩展Kelly积的通用正规松驰幺半结构；4. 在一般对称幺半范畴中，将幺半运算识别为幺半Λ-序列中的幺半群；5. 建立了闭幺半局部化定理。
AI.conclusion: 该研究系统建立了Λ-序列中幺半结构和模的理论框架，揭示了Λ-序列与对称序列之间的深刻联系，为幺半运算理论提供了新的范畴论基础，并发展了相关的结构定理和局部化技术。

title: Canonical torsion linking pairings and explicit TMF state spaces of closed 3-manifolds
summary: We study the TMF-valued $(3+1)$-dimensional TQFT of Gukov--Krushkal--Meier--Pei and give an explicit description of the TMF-module state space assigned to a closed $3$-manifold. Our starting point is the torsion linking pairing on $H_1$, viewed as a discriminant form. We construct a canonical, computable package of invariants for torsion linking pairings (uniformly for odd and $2$-primary parts), and from it a canonical tokenization together with an explicit symmetric integral matrix representative realizing the same stable class. This yields an explicit model for the GKMP state space in terms of a rank-one TMF-module $L_b$ with a canonical degree shift determined by signature data. As applications we identify the values on $CP^2$ and, conditional on a natural functoriality/duality statement in GKMP, on $S^2\times S^2$ with the Hopf elements $\pmν$ and $η$, respectively. Finally, we establish a rank-one time-reversal duality $L_{(-n)}\simeq L_{(n)}^\vee[1]$ for all integers $n$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Gukov-Krushkal-Meier-Pei的TMF值(3+1)维TQFT，给出了闭3-流形上TMF模态空间的显式描述，基于H₁上的扭结配对构造了规范可计算的不变量包。
AI.motivation: 研究GKMP的TMF值(3+1)维拓扑量子场论，目标是给出闭3-流形上TMF模态空间的显式描述，从而更好地理解和计算该理论。
AI.method: 从H₁上的扭结配对出发，将其视为判别形式，构造了扭结配对的规范可计算不变量包，并从中得到规范标记化和显式对称积分矩阵代表，最终建立GKMP态空间的显式模型。
AI.result: 得到了GKMP态空间的显式模型：秩为1的TMF模L_b，其规范度移由符号数据确定；识别了在CP²和S²×S²上的值分别为Hopf元素±ν和η；建立了秩为1的时间反演对偶性L_{(-n)}≃L_{(n)}^∨[1]。
AI.conclusion: 成功构造了GKMP TQFT中闭3-流形上TMF模态空间的显式描述，建立了扭结配对与TMF模之间的对应关系，并得到了重要的应用结果和对偶性质。

title: On the equivariant triangulation of some small covers
summary: In this paper, we study certain properties of $\mathbb{Z}_2^n$-equivariant triangulations of small covers. We show that any $\mathbb{Z}_2^n$-equivariant triangulation of a small cover naturally induces a triangulation of the orbit space. Then, we explicitly construct the minimal $\mathbb{Z}_2^3$-equivariant triangulation of $\mathbb{RP}^3$, which contains $11$ vertices and prove that this is the unique $\mathbb{Z}_2^3$-equivariant triangulation of $\mathbb{RP}^3$ with $11$ vertices. For a finite group $G$, we give a method for constructing some $G$-equivariant triangulations of connected sums of manifolds from their respective $G$-equivariant triangulations. In particular, we construct a $\mathbb{Z}_2^3$-equivariant triangulation of $\mathbb{RP}^3 \# \mathbb{RP}^3$ with $17$ vertices, which is the best known yet. This triangulation of $\mathbb{RP}^3 \# \mathbb{RP}^3$ provides another minimal $g$-vector improving one of the result of Lutz in \cite{LS}. Moreover, we prove that a $\ZZ_2^4$-equivariant triangulation of $\mathbb{RP}^4$ requires at least $18$ vertices.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了ℤ₂ⁿ-等变三角剖分的性质，构造了ℝℙ³的最小等变三角剖分（11个顶点），并构建了ℝℙ³#ℝℙ³的等变三角剖分（17个顶点），改进了已知结果。
AI.motivation: 研究ℤ₂ⁿ-等变三角剖分的性质，特别是小覆盖的等变三角剖分，旨在理解群作用下的三角剖分结构，并寻找最小顶点数的等变三角剖分。
AI.method:
1. 证明小覆盖的ℤ₂ⁿ-等变三角剖分自然诱导轨道空间的三角剖分
2. 显式构造ℝℙ³的最小ℤ₂³-等变三角剖分（11个顶点）
3. 提出从单个流形的G-等变三角剖分构造连通和的G-等变三角剖分的方法
4. 构造ℝℙ³#ℝℙ³的ℤ₂³-等变三角剖分（17个顶点）
5. 证明ℝℙ⁴的ℤ₂⁴-等变三角剖分至少需要18个顶点
AI.result:
1. ℝℙ³的最小ℤ₂³-等变三角剖分包含11个顶点且唯一
2. ℝℙ³#ℝℙ³的ℤ₂³-等变三角剖分包含17个顶点，是目前已知的最佳结果
3. ℝℙ⁴的ℤ₂⁴-等变三角剖分至少需要18个顶点
4. 改进了Lutz关于g-向量的结果
AI.conclusion: 论文建立了小覆盖等变三角剖分的基本性质，构造了具体流形的最小等变三角剖分，并提出了构造连通和等变三角剖分的一般方法，为等变三角剖分理论提供了新的结果和构造技术。

title: Knot contact homology as a planar limit of Chern-Simons theory
summary: We prove a conjecture relating augmentation varieties to the large $N$ limit of Chern-Simons theory. Although this does not directly establish that the augmentation polynomial of a knot is the classical limit of a deformed $\hat{A}$-polynomial -- as suggested by Aganagić and Vafa -- it reduces the problem to characterizing certain algebraic properties of a module over the quantum torus, introduced in work of Gaiotto, Kannagi, and Sanjurjo. We term this the \emph{HOMFLYPT difference module}, which captures relations between the colored HOMFLYPT polynomials of different antisymmetric colorings. We demonstrate that the classical limit of this difference module for a knot is precisely the degree 0 abelianized knot contact homology of the knot, and we provide a natural extension of this result to links.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了关于增广簇与陈-西蒙斯理论大N极限的一个猜想，建立了HOMFLYPT差分模与结接触同调的联系
AI.motivation: 研究结的增广簇与陈-西蒙斯理论大N极限之间的关系，验证Aganagić和Vafa关于增广多项式是变形A-多项式经典极限的猜想
AI.method: 引入HOMFLYPT差分模概念，该模捕捉不同反对称着色下彩色HOMFLYPT多项式之间的关系，并证明其经典极限与结接触同调的联系
AI.result: 证明了增广簇与陈-西蒙斯理论大N极限的猜想，建立了HOMFLYPT差分模的经典极限等于结的0次阿贝尔化接触同调，并将结果推广到链环
AI.conclusion: 虽然未能直接证明增广多项式是变形A-多项式经典极限的猜想，但将问题简化为刻画量子环上模的代数性质，建立了HOMFLYPT差分模与结接触同调的重要联系

title: The Grothendieck-Teichmüller group $\widehat{GT}$ acts on the genus $g$ mapping class group with $0$ or $1$ marked point
summary: The goal of this article is to prove that the Grothendieck-Teichmüller group $\widehat{GT}$ acts on $\widehatΓ_{g,0}$ and $\widehatΓ_{g,1}$,the (full) profinite genus $g$ mapping class group with $0$ or $1$ marked point, for every $g>0$.

AI.tldr: Grothendieck-Teichmüller群作用于亏格g的映射类群（0或1个标记点）
AI.motivation: 探索Grothendieck-Teichmüller群与映射类群之间的代数几何联系，扩展已知的群作用关系
AI.method: 使用代数几何和群论方法，构造Grothendieck-Teichmüller群在映射类群上的作用
AI.result: 成功证明了对于所有g>0，Grothendieck-Teichmüller群可以作用于亏格g的映射类群（0或1个标记点）
AI.conclusion: 该结果建立了Grothendieck-Teichmüller群与映射类群之间的重要联系，为相关领域研究提供了新视角

title: Khovanov concordance minima and the (4,5) torus knot
summary: Ribbon concordance gives a partial order on knot types, and applying a knot homology functor to a ribbon concordance gives an inclusion of the homologies. The question of the existence of global ribbon minima in each concordance class is a generalization of the slice-ribbon conjecture, which asserts that the unknot is the global minimum in its class. We show that the (reduced rational) Khovanov homology of the (4,5) torus knot is a summand in the Khovanov homology of any knot in its concordance class.

AI.tldr: 论文证明(4,5)环面结的Khovanov同调是其共轭类中任何结的Khovanov同调的子直和
AI.motivation: 研究带状共轭给出的结类型偏序关系，探索每个共轭类中是否存在全局带状最小值，这是切片-带状猜想（断言平凡结是其类中的全局最小值）的推广
AI.method: 使用带状共轭和结同调函子，分析(4,5)环面结的Khovanov同调在其共轭类中的性质
AI.result: 证明(4,5)环面结的（约化有理）Khovanov同调是其共轭类中任何结的Khovanov同调的子直和
AI.conclusion: 这一结果为研究带状共轭类中的全局最小值问题提供了新视角，支持了切片-带状猜想的推广

title: On the Non-Orientable $3$- and $4$-Genera of a Knot: Connections and Comparisons
summary: We define a new quantity, the Euler-normalized non-orientable genus, to connect a variety of ideas in the theory of non-orientable surfaces bounded by knots. This quantity is used to reframe non-orientable slice-torus bounds on the non-orientable $4$-genus, to bound below the Turaev genus as a measure of distance to an alternating knot, and to understand gaps between the $3$- and $4$-dimensional non-orientable genera of pretzel knots. Further, we make connections to essential surfaces in knot complements and the Slope Conjecture.

AI.tldr: 提出欧拉归一化不可定向亏格新概念，用于统一研究不可定向曲面与纽结理论中的多个问题，包括不可定向切片环面界、Turaev亏格下界、三/四维不可定向亏格差距、以及纽结补中本质曲面与斜率猜想。
AI.motivation: 需要建立统一框架来连接不可定向曲面与纽结理论中的多个概念，包括不可定向4-亏格、Turaev亏格、三/四维不可定向亏格差距等，以深化对这些几何不变量之间关系的理解。
AI.method: 定义新的欧拉归一化不可定向亏格量，将其应用于：1) 重构不可定向切片环面对不可定向4-亏格的界；2) 作为距离交错纽结的度量，给出Turaev亏格的下界；3) 分析pretzel纽结的三维与四维不可定向亏格之间的差距；4) 连接纽结补中本质曲面与斜率猜想。
AI.result: 新定义的欧拉归一化不可定向亏格成功统一了多个理论框架，为不可定向曲面与纽结理论提供了新的分析工具，能够建立不同几何不变量之间的联系，并揭示它们之间的深层关系。
AI.conclusion: 欧拉归一化不可定向亏格是一个有力的新概念，能够连接不可定向曲面理论中的多个重要问题，为理解纽结的几何性质提供了统一视角，并在切片环面界、Turaev亏格、亏格差距等问题的研究中展现出应用价值。
